section.title: TN_EGrpLink Struct Reference
section.section:
Detailed Description
A link to event group: used when event group can be connected to some kernel object, such as queue.
Definition at line 254 of file tn_eventgrp.h.
Data Fields
struct TN_EventGrp * eventgrp
event group whose event(s) should be managed by other kernel object
TN_UWord pattern
event pattern to manage
The documentation for this struct was generated from the following file: core/tn_eventgrp.h
